CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(Project_Name__r.Project_type__c) != 'Repair & Alteration - Work Item Detail' ,(Core_Shell_Total_Cost_Adjusted__c + Security_Cost_Adjusted__c + TRCS_Cost_Adjusted__c + TI_Cost_Adjusted__c + Other_Direct_Costs__c ),(GSA_Costs__c + GSAPkg_Costs__c + Tenant_RWA_Costs__c + Tenant_Amortized_Costs__c + Other_Direct_Costs__c ))
CustomField.label: Total Cost Adjusted
